item.name: Borderlands Tabard
entries: While you're wearing this tabard, NPCs in the Keep on the Borderlands are initially {@variantrule Friendly [Attitude]|XPHB|Friendly} toward you.

item.name: Cultist's Robe
entries: While wearing this occult outfit, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on any ability check you make to impersonate a cultist in the Cult of Chaos.
